entry.title: CLTV opcode allocation; long-term plans?
entry.summary: The speaker has expressed their preference for separate opcodes, although they do not have a strong opinion on the matter. The reason behind this is due to the likelihood of separate opcodes being deployed independently, which may result in an end product that does not fit neatly into the current CLTV argument structure. It is clear that the speaker is considering the potential consequences and implications of the decision to use separate opcodes.
